name: Ghostrunner but bad and with guns
name_original: Ghostrunner but bad and with guns
description: The controls are standard but you can grapple with the middle button. You have a shotgun and a revolver and need to reach the finish. Good luck! NOTE: This is my first game ever(more like a prototype) but I don't wanna push myself too hard and demotivate myself but at least I did what I wanted so here you go! :)
